definitions: An act of going in or coming in.
A point or place of entering.
The right or privilege to enter.
An item entered in a register, list, or account.
A person or thing entered for a competition or race.
examples: The entry of the new law caused a stir.
The main entry to the building was locked.
She was denied entry to the club.
Make an entry in the logbook.
There were many entries in the marathon.
